vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀνώτερος, α, ον,
comparative adjective from ἄνω (B), upper, higher, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἐπιβουλῆς ἀ. γέγονεν got the better of,[Refs 4th c.BC+]; neuter as adverb, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; above, [LXX]; earlier in a book, [NT+2nd c.BC+]; to a higher place, [NT]. adverb ἀνωτέρω, see at {ἄνω}.
vocabInfos.shortDef: higher, better in social standing; earlier, previously, first
vocabInfos.mediumDef: higher, better in social standing; earlier, previously, first
vocabInfos._es_Definition: adv. primero, anteriormente (de una declaración previa) ; a un mejor asiento (LUC.14:10)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 較高的
1a) 之先的, 上面的 (來 10:8)
1b) 處在較高的地位 (路 14:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 较高的
1a) 之先的, 上面的 (来 10:8)
1b) 处在较高的地位 (路 14:10)
